ray.rage.scene

Interface Node.Controller

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractController, OrbitController, RotationController, ScalingController, TranslationController, WaypointController
    Enclosing interface:
    Node

    public static interface Node.Controller
extends Disposable
    A controller handles nodes make it easier to apply behaviors by concrete implementations.

    Implementations are expected to respect the parent/child relationships controlled nodes had prior to being added. In other words, controlled nodes do not get assigned to new parents or get new children.

    Author:
    Raymond L. Rivera

        void addNode(Node node)
        Adds a Node for this controller to control.
        Parameters:
        node - The Node to be controlled by the controller.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the node is null.

      • removeNode

        Parameters:
        node - The node to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the node is null.
        See Also:

      • removeNode

        void removeNode(java.lang.String name)
        Removes the node with the specified name from this controller's control.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the node to be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the name is empty.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If the node is null.
        See Also:
        removeNode(Node)

      • removeAllNodes

        void removeAllNodes()
        Removes all nodes from this controller's control.

      • update

        void update(float elapsedTimeMillis)
        Causes this controller to update all the nodes currently under its control.
        Parameters:
        elapsedTimeMillis - The time elapsed since the last update, in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the argument is negative.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets whether the updates provided by this controller are being applied or not.
        Parameters:
        enabled - True to apply the updates. False otherwise.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Gets whether this controller is currently applying its updates or not.
        Returns:
        True if nodes are being updated. False otherwise.
